channel.title: Test RDF
channel.description: XML.com features a rich mix of information and services for the XML community.

item.title: Test item RDF
item.prd:description: XML is placing increasingly heavy loads on the existing technical infrastructure of the Internet.
item.prd:creator: JV

item.title: Test item RDF2
item.prd:description: Tool and API support for the Resource Description Framework is slowly coming of age. Edd Dumbill takes a look at RDFDB, one of the most exciting new RDF toolkits.
item.prd:creator: Hue
